name: Magic Pong Battle
description:
UP /Down arrows:  Control the player (on the right).

You can cast magic elements on the paddle using  the key number 1 for fire,  2  for grass and 3 for water.

  Fire beats grass//  grass beats water//  water beats fire. 

Hello everyone. I've been learning game development and coding for a few months now and I've decided to lauch something so I can learn this important step of the gaming creation process.

I wanted to go with someting simple, so i created this little pong game that you can cast magic spells and defeat your enemy.  It's super simple but very strategic and (maybe) fun.

Every comment  you have on this little game I created is wellcome and apreciated, so leave yours! It will help a lot!

I hope you have fun on this  intense and magic pong battle!  

Thank you for playing my game!

Music: Five Armies - Keving McLeod.
